content:
Leters 
 Clare Verbek, Thembani 
 Dladla and Zanele Buthelezi 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Last wek I received a lot 
 
 of leters. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Monday my doctor 
 
 wrote a leter to my 
 
 teacher. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thabisile is sick. She must 
 
 stay at home. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Tuesday I got a leter 
 
 from my clas. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Get wel son Thabisile! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Wednesday I got a leter 
 
 from my best friend. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I drew this picture for you. 
 
 Love from Dudu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Thursday I got a leter 
 
 from my mother. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
